comments:
I'm using 
org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.draw2d.ui.render.internal.svg.export.GraphicsSVG 
in a GEF application to export diagrams to SVG files. But I was always 
getting an exception like this:

java.lang.RuntimeException: The class: class
org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.draw2d.ui.render.internal.svg.export.GraphicsSVG 
has
not implemented this new graphics function
at org.eclipse.draw2d.Graphics.subclassFunctionMission
(Graphics.java:897)
at org.eclipse.draw2d.Graphics.setAntialias(Graphics.java:740)
at ch.unizh.ifi.adora.parts.AdoraModelEditPart$1.paint
(AdoraModelEditPart.java:94)
Added support in the GraphicsToGraphics2DAdaptor class for delegating anti-alias calls to the Graphics2D wrapped class.

traces.message: The class: class org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.draw2d.ui.render.internal.svg.export.GraphicsSVG  has not implemented this new graphics function
